review: Pretty good for a free gameBlacklight: Retribution has very customizable characters and weapons with different barrels, sights, ammo and the list goes  on and on. Different camoes for characters, helmets for your agent (character), armour like boots, body armour, helmets and more.Good Elements of gameplayLots of game modes, balanced weapons, good sound effects and alot more make this game awesome. Nice sountrack too.
Such a fun life simulation STEAM ESSENTIAL! But the price is too high =) Still a fun game though!
